module.name: socolissimo
module.description: PrestaShop brings you the Colissimo delivery options module: a turnkey solution offering all of Colissimo's services for delivery to France and in Europe
module.author: Quadra Informatique
module.description_full: PrestaShop brings you the Colissimo delivery options module: a turnkey solution offering all of Colissimo's services for delivery to France and in Europe. 48h delivery service to home addresses or collection points.
module.additional_description: A free solution with no need for development, easy to install from your Prestashop back-office.An "iframe" delivery page that is consistent with the site, thus ensuring continuity in the buying process.A wide range of shipping methods to meet the needs of your e-buyers.Increased revenue through the Colissimo service in EuropeAccess to a dedicated customer area in the "Colissimo Box" and a tracking tool for your shipments: ColiView.A mobile version of the module to ensure compatibility and consistent sales throughout the day. This module will help you generate additional sales thanks to your multichannel presence.NB: This module is for traders with a SIRET French business identification number.

module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The Mondial Relay module developed with Prestashop allows stores to use the deliveries by Point Relais® (over 6300 traders proximity) and at home in France and Europe. Mondial Relay shares his expertise with all merchants, regardless of their level of activity, proposing an offer without prerequisites of parcels quantity, without commitment period and no management fees or subscription.
module.additional_description: With this module, you will have a wider choice of delivery modes, your customers will appreciate the ability to be delivered by Point Relais® which you will improve your conversion rate.

module.name: envoimoinscher
module.displayName: Boxtal Shipping - pick up, door to door, express
module.description: Manage multiple carriers using one single module and save up to 75% on your shipping costs without commitments or any contracts
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Manage multiple carriers using one single module and save up to 75% on your shipping costs without commitments or any contracts.
module.additional_description: 1. IMPROVE YOUR CONVERSION RATESGive a choice between different shipping options which suit best your clients : pick up stations (Mondial Relay, Relais Colis, etc.), standard (Colissimo, Happy-Post, etc.), express (Chronopost, FedEx, DHL Express, UPS, TNT Express, etc.). 2. REDUCE YOUR SHIPPING COSTSSave up to 75% on your shipping costs with the best shipping services without commitments or any contracts. 3. SAVE TIME ON MANAGING YOUR SHIPMENTSPrint shipping labels directly from your PrestaShop back-office. Track, cancel or reschedule your orders in one place. One single invoice for all shipping services. 4. ACCELERATE YOUR WEBSITE LAUNCH One single plugin to manage all your shipments. Boxtal is your only contact before, during and after delivery, whatever carriers were selected. Save time and focus on the essential of your business.

module.name: bluesnap

module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: BlueSnap is an all-in-one payment solution, providing both a merchant account and payment gateway designed to accelerate commerce for merchants selling globally.   By connecting your PrestaShop store with BlueSnap, you can accept payments securely from shoppers anywhere in the world in their local currency. BlueSnap provides analytics and reporting to make it easy to identify opportunities for higher conversions. In addition, PrestaShop merchants process credit and debit card transactions with a secure checkout form, which is displayed directly on your checkout page so shoppers never leave your store.
module.additional_description: All-in one payment solution:Combined merchant account and payment gateway for fast & easy on-boardingAbility to board merchants globallyNo long-term contracts or setup fees, and the most competitive transaction fees in the industryHigher payment conversionsMinimized PCI Scope

module.name: becommerce
module.description: The BeCommerce Label is a quality mark for online shopping of products and services in the BeLux
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The BeCommerce Label is a quality mark for online shopping of products and services in the BeLux. The BeCommerce Label demonstrates that your company complies with the BeCommerce Label Code and that your e-commerce site was certified by an independent organisation i.e. Bureau Veritas. With the BeCommerce Label members inform the consumer that they provide a reliable and secure way of online shopping.
module.additional_description: ​Advantages •        As a member you are allowed to display the BeCommerce Quality label. Research has demonstrated that the BeCommerce Quality label stands for reliability and safety. 83% of the consumers know/recognise the BeCommerce Quality label and 72% take the BeCommerce Quality label into account for online purchases. The BeCommerce Quality label provides consumers’ trust and contributes to higher conversion, therefore more turnover. •        BeCommerce manages the interests of the members by – among others – influencing the (new) law and regulations. It also regularly takes part in conversations with the various parties around the e-commerce market. •        With the membership and the BeCommerce Quality label, you show you comply with the law and regulations. You can apply the Terms & Conditions of BeCommerce. BeCommerce has the compliance of laws and regulations as single quality mark independently checked through the certification carried out by Bureau Veritas. This too increases the consumers’ trust in your online shop. •        You entitle the consumer to independent mediation, if you and the consumer have a dispute about the purchase. BeCommerce mediates with experienced solicitors and employees. This ensures very few complaints end up in a legal dispute. Should it go that far, BeCommerce is the only quality mark to provide independent dispute settlement. •        As a BeCommerce member you will enjoy knowledge and information share with other members. You receive free tests, white papers and publications, have access to the exclusive members network and you can participate in work groups (interest management). BeCommerce organises workshops and conventions in which you can participate and network free of charge or on a discount.

module.name: chargeback
module.description: Issuer alerts, compelling responses and real-time dispute resolution – in one tool. NOT a fraud filter, this is automated dispute management and revenue recovery. Works with Stripe, PayPal, Authorize
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Issuer alerts, compelling responses and real-time dispute resolution – in one tool. NOT a fraud filter, this is automated dispute management and revenue recovery. Works with Stripe, PayPal, Authorize.net, First Data, WorldPay, Braintree and more.
module.additional_description: Chargeback is a Utah-based software company that automates post-transaction fraud and dispute management. We know your goal is to maximize revenue, that's why we created the Chargeback App. This dispute management tool picks up the ball where fraud scoring and manual reviews fall short, enabling you to efficiently minimize lost revenue and increase profit. Level-up your teamChargeback is the only dispute management platform designed to empower your team, not replace it.Identifying and gathering the data required to respond to a single dispute often requires logging into three separate systems: your storefront, payment gateway and merchant account processor. By consolidating the data from each, the Chargeback App helps you stop disputes in real-time and craft detailed response documents that adhere to the chargeback rebuttal rules set by Visa, MasterCard, American Express and Discover. The Chargeback App provides expert guidance and support at every stage of the dispute lifecycle to protect your revenue. Consolidate all your PrestShop, payment gateway and merchant account data into a single platformQuickly respond to disputes with a full understanding of the order's status and dispute stageImprove dispute management and minimize lost revenue with expert support and guidance Intercept disputes, take actionChargeback Alerts are enhanced notifications that allow you to take powerful actions like instant gift card deactivation, cancel recurring billing, and services suspension. Allowing you to prevent fulfillment of goods and services for which you won't receive payment. Generate fast, accurate, and compelling responsesThe Chargeback App equips you with a first-of-its-kind response generator. Order, customer, transaction, and dispute data is auto-populated into responses based on current card network rules and regulations. Wave goodbye to tedious data pulling and copy+paste nightmares. The Chargeback App quickly identifies and aggregates your data so you can respond to alerts and disputes immediately. Order, transaction, alert and dispute data is aggregated into a single record.Guided workflows help you add required and optional evidence blocks.A multipage PDF and DOCx is generated and sent back to the issuer.

This means that you no longer need to connect to multiple back-offices, you manage everything from Prestashop. Cdiscount Flux is a cloud-based, self-contained solution that enables you to automate the management of catalog, orders, order tracking. You no longer have to worry about inventory updates, new product creations, Cdiscount Flux automatically manages feeds to and from Cdiscount marketplace. module.name: ns8csp
module.description: Protect your store from the three big revenue killers: order fraud, advertising fraud, and poor performance
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Protect your store from the three big revenue killers: order fraud, advertising fraud, and poor performance. Reduce your store’s chargebacks, increase the effectiveness of your ad campaigns, and ensure quality of your site’s user experience.
module.additional_description: NS8 Complete Storefront Protection uses industry-leading techniques to identify bots and other malicious activity. As a platform-based approach to online threat reduction, NS8 Complete Storefront Protection is designed to help your eCommerce businesses fight the three big revenue killers: order fraud, advertising fraud, and poor performance. Revenue Killer #1: Order Fraud NS8 Complete Storefront Protection watches and scores every visitor to your store. When we detect suspicious activity before, during, or after an order is placed, it is reflected in the order’s EQ8 score. An order with a low score is most likely fraudulent, and depending on how low the score is, it is held or flagged for manual review. When an order’s score is low enough to be suspicious, but not low enough for the store administrator to confidently cancel the order, NS8 Compete Storefront Protection provides the tools to escalate the order and request e-mail and SMS text verification from the user. If the user verifies their phone number, the store administrator can process the order with confidence. Revenue Killer #2: Advertising Fraud Advertising fraud (especially remarketing fraud) is a huge and growing issue for online merchants. Up to 34% of online advertising campaign budgets are stolen using fraudulent traffic. NS8 Complete Storefront Protection not only scores all of the traffic visiting your store, but it also detects and records the traffic’s source. You will see when, and which, advertising campaigns are delivering low-quality, high-risk, fraudulent traffic. You will be able to save money and increase revenue by eliminating poorly performing campaigns and focusing your budget on the successful campaigns that deliver results. Revenue Killer #3: Poor Performance NS8 Complete Storefront Protection includes five critical monitors that every PrestaShop store should have to ensure their store’s performance and customer experience. These include the monitoring of SSL certificates, being added to a spam list, getting flagged for malware, store pages failing to load correctly, and any drop in performance against the global average of online stores. When an issue arises, you'll be automatically notified immediately via email and/or SMS.

module.description_full: Use the power of the SMS to reassure your clients and increase your sales!Sales status, shopping basket reminder, birthdays or Marketing Cible campaigns, give your shop an extra breath with our SMS module.
module.additional_description: Strengthen your client relations and increase your sales thanks to our handy and simple SMS sending solution. Inform your clients in real time of the progression of their purchaseRemind them of their current shopping basketCommunicate efficiently on all your events (sales, private sales, …)Segment and synchronize automatically your contacts on our platformBe informed by SMS about any new subscriptions, new orders and purchases or return demandsFollow and analyse the results of your campaignsManage your budget (no subscription, no hidden costs)After sale services and support based in FranceLowest price on  the market

module.name: gestpay
module.description: The official Gestpay’s (www.gestpay.it) plugin for PrestaShop enables you to accept any form of payment supported by Banca Sella Group’s payment gateway
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The official Gestpay’s (www.gestpay.it) plugin for PrestaShop enables you to accept any form of payment supported by Banca Sella Group’s payment gateway.
module.additional_description: GestPay is the solution that allows to maximize your e-commerce conversions, thanks to the customization of the platform by integrating functions that also optimize the customer user experience. It is possible to accept payments by credit and debit card and over 200 alternative payment methods, with the security of an evolved fraud prevention system built upon artificial intelligence technologies.

module.name: recolize
module.description: Personalizacja jest nieodzownym elementem każdego PrestaShopu. Maksimum zysków, minimum wysiłku
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Personalizacja jest nieodzownym elementem każdego PrestaShopu. Maksimum zysków, minimum wysiłku. Dziecinnie proste dzięki Recolize! Korzystaj bezpłatnie – nie potrzeba karty kredytowej.
module.additional_description: Czy wiesz, że większość odwiedzających Twój sklep opuszcza go bez żadnej interakcji?Zoptymalizuj ruch na stronie dzięki w pełni zautomatyzowanym spersonalizowanym rekomendacjom produktów i zaciekaw swoich klientów odpowiednimi produktami we właściwym czasie. Twoi klienci podziękują Ci poprzez nawet czterokrotnie większy współczynnik konwersjidodatkowy dochód na poziomie nawet do 20%.zwiększenie średniej wartości zamówienia Rozpocznij już teraz bezpłatne korzystanie z rozwiązania „plug & play” Recolize.Opłaty uzależnione od sukcesu – po tysiącu bezpłatnych kliknięć rekomendacji na miesiąc płacisz jedynie 0,039€ za kliknięcie.

module.name: hermesc
module.description: With the module Hermes Shipping Interface Connector you can create your shipping labels for Hermes directly from the backoffice of your Prestashop
module.author: Silbersaiten
module.description_full: With the module Hermes Shipping Interface Connector you can create your shipping labels for Hermes directly from the backoffice of your Prestashop. Select package size, generate label, print - finished.
module.additional_description: You can generate and print as many labels per order as you like, and even allow your customers to deliver their orders to package stores. The shipping process with Hermes can be done directly from the PrestaShop backofficeAdditional Hermes services can be selected within the backofficeThe Hermes mail prosecute can be accessed from the Prestashop backofficeThe package shop search and other services offer your customers a positive shopping experiencePickup orders are also set in the PrestaShop backoffice

module.name: match2one
module.description: Match2One will help you find new customers online, by placing ads across 1000's of relevant websites in front of people who are likely to become your next customer
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Match2One will help you find new customers online, by placing ads across 1000's of relevant websites in front of people who are likely to become your next customer.  No minimum investments, no signups fees and is easy to use.
module.additional_description: By connecting Match2One to your website, the platform will automatically learn about your online audience - where to find new customers online, and target people who have visited your site. You can sit back and relax, Match2One’s optimisation engine will automatically make intelligent choices for you. If you’re looking for an advertising tool that will help you get more new customers, you’ve come to the right place. Find new customers → A Prospecting campaign tracks, analyses data from your webshop and uses this to find similar customers online. This will help you drive more traffic and increase your sales.Convert more visitors → Retargeting converts visitors into buyers. Generally 2-3% of shoppers convert on the first visit to an online store. Retargeting brings back the other 97%. Retargeting works by tracking people who visit your site and showing your ads to them as they visit other sites online.

module.name: ekomiratingsandreviews
module.description: Seamlessly integrate eKomi seller and product review collection with your Prestashop account
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Seamlessly integrate eKomi seller and product review collection with your Prestashop account. Review requests are automatically triggered from your shop backend, and any product reviews will be displayed automatically on corresponding product pages.
module.additional_description: eKomi is the leading third-party review service, specializing in the collection, management and publishing of seller and product reviews and ratings for businesses. Thanks to our constant innovation and market-leading technology, we offer the most varied and flexible review generation methods, allowing you to reach all your clients to pro-actively request their feedback.Automatically collect and display authentic seller and product ratings and reviews.Increase trust in your business and boost customer loyalty to increase sales.Activate your Seller Rating Extension to display stars on your Google Ads and increase your Click-through-rate by 17%.Drive more qualified traffic to your siteIncentivise further purchases with our integrated coupon feature.Decrease returns by displaying product reviews on your corresponding product pages.Overall, the more ratings you get for your business, the more traffic you drive to your site, the more trust you create among current and potential clients, and the more you will boost your sales and ROI - so get started today!

module.name: psaddonsconnect
module.description: 2 w 1: zapewnij swojemu sklepowi podwójną korzyść dzięki aktualizacjom bezpieczeństwa i funkcjonalnym oraz przesyłanym co tydzień poradom dotyczącym e-commerce
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: 2 w 1: zapewnij swojemu sklepowi podwójną korzyść dzięki aktualizacjom bezpieczeństwa i funkcjonalnym oraz przesyłanym co tydzień poradom dotyczącym e-commerce.
module.additional_description: Po połączeniu swojego konta w PrestaShop Addons z tym modułem:Będziemy przesyłać Ci co tydzień porady dotyczące e-commerce bądź przydatne triki związane z kalendarzem e-handlu. Zobaczysz je w swoim kokpicie (np. jak i kiedy rozpocząć przygotowania do Black Friday, początku roku szkolnego itp.);  Chroń swój sklep, będąc cały czas na bieżąco z najnowszymi aktualizacjami bezpieczeństwa dla modułów pobranych z PrestaShop Addons;  Korzystaj z nowych funkcji dodawanych do modułów pobranych w serwisie PrestaShop Addons.
